subject: I Love You But I Love Me Too
text:
You held me down, 
And I swore it would be the last, 
From this day onwards, 
You would become my past, 

How can I leave you, 
When my heart loves you so, 
I keep plucking up the courage, 
But my heart won't let you go, 

I love you so much, 
But the pain we cause is great, 
And everytime we argue, 
My love just turns to hate

I love you, BUT, I love me too, 
Which is why today, I have to leave you.
